item.title: アマゾンは、第2世代のFire TV Stick 4K MaxとFire TV Omni QLEDシリーズで、アレクサのプロンプトを使ってAIが生成した背景を作成できるようになった（Lauren Forristal/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Lauren Forristal / TechCrunch:
Amazon now lets US users create AI-generated backgrounds using Alexa prompts on the second-gen Fire TV Stick 4K Max and the Fire TV Omni QLED Series  —  Amazon is officially rolling out the ability to create AI-generated images on Fire TV devices.  Starting today, the feature is available …

item.title: Netflixは、アップルビジョンプロのネイティブアプリを発表する予定も、iPadアプリをプラットフォーム上で許可する予定もなく、ユーザーはウェブブラウザでNetflixを視聴できるとしている（Mark Gurman/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Mark Gurman / Bloomberg:
Netflix is not planning to launch a native Apple Vision Pro app or allow its iPad app on the platform, and says users can watch Netflix on the web browser  —  Netflix Inc. isn't planning to launch an app for Apple Inc.'s upcoming Vision Pro headset, marking a high-profile snub of the new technology …

item.title: CondéNastはスタッフへのメモの中で、PitchforkをGQの組織に取り込むことを発表し、PitchforkのEIC Puja PatelとPitchforkの従業員の一部を解雇した（Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:
Alex Weprin / The Hollywood Reporter:
In a note to staff, Condé Nast announces it is bringing Pitchfork into the GQ organization, and lays off Pitchfork EIC Puja Patel and some Pitchfork employees  —  Pitchfork editor-in-chief Puja Patel will depart the company in the consolidation.  —  It's the end of an era for Pitchfork.

item.title: 20の著名なスクリーン業界団体からなるグループが、世界各国の政府に対し、ストリーミング配信者がローカルコンテンツにより多く投資することを保証する規制を制定するよう要請（Nick Vivarelli/Variety）
item.description:
Nick Vivarelli / Variety:
A group of 20 prominent screen trade organizations ask governments around the world to enact regulations ensuring that streamers invest more in local content  —  The joint plea — hailing from production bodies in Europe, Canada, Australasia and Latin America — comes as streaming services …

item.title: AmazonとTastemadeが、Prime VideoとAmazon Freevee向けに15本の新番組を含む、台本なしのライフスタイルコンテンツを制作する複数年の初契約を締結（BreAnna Bell/Variety）
item.description:
BreAnna Bell / Variety:
Amazon and Tastemade sign a multi-year first-look deal to produce unscripted lifestyle content, including 15 new shows for Prime Video and Amazon Freevee  —  Amazon and Tastemade have signed a multi-year first look deal to produce unscripted lifestyle content.

item.title: パラマウントは、ギリシャとベルギーでハブを立ち上げた後、フィリピンのTap DMVとインドのJioCinemaという2つの新しいブランドハブパートナーをParamount+のために発表した（Dade Hayes/Deadline）
item.description:
Dade Hayes / Deadline:
Paramount announces two new branded hub partners for Paramount+, Tap DMV in the Philippines and JioCinema in India, after launching hubs in Greece and Belgium  —  With its streaming operations facing scrutiny as 2024 gets under way, Paramount Global continues to pursue a diversified approach to distributing its flagship, Paramount+.

item.title: 内部メモ：YouTubeは、スポーツ、メディア、映画、テレビなどさまざまなチームを1つのチームに統合するなど、クリエイターのマネジメントチームを再編している（James Hale/Tubefilter）
item.description:
James Hale / Tubefilter:
Internal memo: YouTube is restructuring its creator management teams, including consolidating various sports, media, film, and TV teams into a single team  —  YouTube's partnerships side is undergoing its first corporate restructuring in a decade-one that'll see changes to the creator management …

item.title: 電子メールグーグル、YouTubeの運営チームとクリエイター・マネジメント・チームから100人の従業員削減を計画、関係者によるとYouTubeの従業員数は7,173人（Nico Grant/New York Times）
item.description:
Nico Grant / New York Times:
Email: Google plans to cut 100 employees from YouTube's operations and creator management teams; a source says YouTube employs 7,173 people  —  The layoffs are part of efforts by the video platform's parent company, Google, to trim costs and bureaucracy as it embraces artificial intelligence.

Max Tani / @maxwelltani:
News: In a note to staff, Condé Nast announces that Pitchfork is being moved under GQ. [image]

item.title: CNN、初代エグゼクティブ・エディターに長年の重役ヴァージニア・モーズリーを指名、CNNの国際ニュース主任マイク・マッカーシーは編集長に（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
CNN names longtime executive Virginia Moseley as the network's first executive editor; CNN's international news chief Mike McCarthy will be managing editor  —  Months after being named the new CEO of CNN Worldwide, Mark Thompson on Wednesday unveiled his strategy for bringing the decades-old cable new network for the digital era.

item.title: EU議会が、公正な報酬や小規模アーティストのプロモーションなど、音楽ストリーミングの抜本的な改革を提案する非合法決議を採択（Jess Weatherbed/The Verge）
item.description:
Jess Weatherbed / The Verge:
The EU Parliament adopts a nonlegislative resolution proposing sweeping changes to music streaming, including fair compensation and promoting smaller artists  —  The EU has proposed sweeping changes within the music streaming industry to promote smaller artists and make sure underpaid performers are being fairly compensated.

item.title: NYTの購読料ビジネスを変革し、CNN+の立ち上げに貢献したアレックス・マッカラムが、デジタル製品・サービス担当副社長としてCNNに再入社（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
Alex MacCallum, who transformed the NYT's subscription business and helped launch CNN+, rejoins CNN as executive VP of digital products and services  —  Alex MacCallum, the digital news product veteran known for transforming the New York Times' subscription business and helping to launch CNN+ …

item.title: メモ：CNNのマーク・トンプソン最高経営責任者（CEO）は、報道業務をテレビとデジタルの1部門に統合する計画で、購読料とモバイルビデオの改善に関するビジョンを概説している（Isabella Simonetti/Wall Street Journal）。
item.description:
Isabella Simonetti / Wall Street Journal:
Memo: CNN CEO Mark Thompson plans to combine newsgathering into one TV-and-digital unit, and outlines his vision for subscriptions and improving mobile video  —  New CNN Boss Shakes Up News Operations, Explores Digital Subscription Model One combined unit will serve TV, streaming and digital platforms …

item.title: The Informationが新ロゴを発表、ウェブサイトのデザインも一新、半導体など主要分野の報道を米国外にも拡大 (Jessica E. Lessin/The Information)
item.description:
Jessica E. Lessin / The Information:
The Information unveils a new logo and a redesign of its website, as the outlet expands its reporting in key areas, including semiconductors, outside the US  —  Today marks a significant milestone for us at The Information.  I am thrilled to unveil a redesign of our site and a new logo.
